### Description
**As a** [role]
**I need** [function]
**So that** [benefit]

### Assumptions and details
* [List any info to guide the story's implementation. Also, provide answers to likely questions]

### Acceptance Criteria
``` gherkin Scenario
Given [context]
When [user's trigger action]
Then [expected result]
```
